welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Billdal, Sweden! Known for its picturesque charm and beautiful nature, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore the wonders of Billdal."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gothenburg City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Gothenburg City Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Landvetter Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Landvetter Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a free registration is required for access.
